channel.title: Eddie on Jeremy Roschelle
channel.description: Recent content in Eddie on Jeremy Roschelle

item.title: Romeo and Juliet Opera
item.description: We had a wonderful time among the Capulet and Montague families at the Kennedy Center. After the hopeful first half, Audrey wisely noted “This isn’t going to end well.” The closing scene was the best part of the opera, even if the lovers will only be together in the afterlife. The Kennedy Center is a great place to see an opera. Details Location: Kennedy Center, Washington DC Date: November 18, 2023 Attending: Jeremy, Audrey, Eddie, Beth

item.title: Mingus
item.description: The Charles Mingus Big Band My birthday present this year was the Charles Mingus Big Band live at Kennedy Center’s Terrace Theater. The band was there to celebrate Jazz Appreciation Month and the centential of the birth of iconic bass player and composer Charles Mingus. We were treated to a dynamic concert, full of energy and contrast. Goodbye Pork Pie Hat A highlight was the second tune, a version of the Mingus composition “Goodbye Pork Pie Hat” using the lyrics written by Joni Mitchell.
